rules: Services are calculated and payable in time units of 30 minute increments.
Minimum time required in direct contact with the patient is 20 minutes for 1 unit.
If an appointment for the interview is not separately booked, the amount payable will be adjusted to a lesser fee.
All services must be rendered personally by the attending physician or they become uninsured services.
notes: Services less than 20 minutes do not constitute any of the services defined in this section.
Inquiry, discussion or provision of advice or information that would ordinarily constitute part of a consultation is included as a common element of other services.
